email.title: J.P. Morgan Winning Women in Technology
email.text:
Hi everyone,
Our sponsor, J.P. Morgan, are holding an event for female students interested in learning about technology. This is a great networking opportunity where you can learn more about working at J.P. Morgan. If you're interested, check out the information below.

event.text:
## Join our Winning Women in Technology event.
In partnership with University College London & Imperial College London.
At J.P. Morgan, we pride ourselves on fostering a culture of learning, inclusion and community for all those interested in a meaningful career in technology.
Our Women in Technology event gives you the chance to meet the influential and inspiring women who are transforming technology at J.P. Morgan and throughout the industry. Hear their stories, experiences and advice that will help you build a successful career in Technology. Join us for pizza, drinks and informal networking.
Winning Women in Technology.
- When: 14 November 2018 - Where: J.P. Morgan, London - Whoâ€™s it for: Female students interested in learning about technology - How to apply: Click [here](http://tinyurl.com/ybjlc7z3) to register before 7 November 2018
We look forward to meeting you.
